bs-uemodulebookpdf-extension-description: Enables BlueSpice export hierarchical collections of articles to Adobe® Portable Document Format (PDF).
bs-uemodulebookpdf-bookexporttoc-article: Embed article TOCs (No indent of article titles)
bs-uemodulebookpdf-overview-title: Adobe® Portable Document Format (PDF) for Bookshelf
bs-uemodulebookpdf-overview-description: Exports a book to Adobe PDF.
bs-uemodulebookpdf-overview-bodycontent: This Module is provided by the  "Bookshelf" Extension and enables export to PDF.
action-uemodulebookpdf-export: exporting a page to PDF as part of a book
right-uemodulebookpdf-export: Export a page to PDF as part of a book
bs-uemodulebookpdf-pref-bookexporttoc-he:
Only article titles: Only shows the article titles in the table of contents of the PDF. 
Embed article TOCs: Shows the table of contents for each article in the table of contents of the PDF.
